packages.name: nameof-transformer
packages.description: A TypeScript transformer which converts types and properties to their actual name for use at runtime.

packages.name: nameof
packages.description: Provides the definitions for the methods which are processed by the nameof-transformer.

packages.name: core
packages.description: Helper methods/classes for data type checking/validation/guarding/error handling.

packages.name: entity
packages.description: Helpers for defining and working with entities.

packages.name: crypto
packages.description: Contains helper methods and classes which implement cryptographic functions.

packages.name: services
packages.description: Contains definitions and helpers for services.

packages.name: schema
packages.description: Contains definitions and helpers for schemas.

packages.name: qr
packages.description: Contains classes for generating QR codes.
